segments.text: There's so much to do and so little time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . Did your mom double check on the church reservations ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . We're going to be married in my hometown church , the first minute of the new millennium !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK ... and what about the buffet and the cake ? Did your mom call the caterer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All set . And we're having a red bean cake and dim sum for the Taiwanese guests , just like your mom wanted .
segments.speaker: S1
